A C Tutorial Series

Posted on April 19, 2017

I’m going to be writing a small C tutorial series for the beginning programmer. I will do my best to explain the language in a way someone who has never programmed before will understand, but it is still recommended to have some programming experience.

I will tailor some parts to fit in line with classes at UCSC, so if you’re a student there, you’ll probably come away from the series with some more value. Keep in mind that this is my first ever genuine attempt at creating a tutorial series. It’ll be a great way to reinforce my knowledge of C, and find a suitable teaching style at the same time.

I’ll hope to have tags and disqus comments implemented soon for future posts, to make it easier for future viewers to get around, if any come by per chance.
